user.title: JTMSBH MF15 Wifi Lock Setup
user.description:
This integration extends the Tuya integration to add lock support for JTMSBH MF15 devices. Make sure you have the Tuya integration configured first.

To obtain your Tuya IoT Platform API credentials:
1. Go to [Tuya IoT Platform](https://iot.tuya.com/)
2. Click Cloud > Development > Create Cloud Project
3. Select 'Smart Home' as Development Method
4. After creation, find your Access ID/Client ID and Access Secret/Client Secret in the project Overview tab
